Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic mathematical text on recto and verso, parts of several columns concerned with arithmetical problems.
Curator's comments: Part of EA 10399? EA 10399 is to be published by A. Imhausen. The papyrus was published by Parker, Demotic Mathematical Papyri (London, 1972), but since then two new fragments have been identified by Carol Andrews from a made-up roll (initially registered as EA 10981) and since rejoined to EA 10399. Two fragments of 10399 are currently framed as 76420.5; other frames of 76420 (unrolled from made up roll in 1981) are also apparently parts of same text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (55977) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/55977)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: delaminating, fragmentary, fractured, loss Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Tabbed: court plaster Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
